description: If you're looking for something more refreshing and less sweet, then this is the perfect drink for you. The Tequila&nbsp;Mojito Cocktail Recipe will be sure to keep your taste buds happy while still giving you a great buzz!
name: Tequila Mojito

recipeInstructions.name: Place the ice cubes, mint leaves, tequila, and simple syrup in the blender or cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Place the ice cubes, mint leaves, tequila, and simple syrup in the blender or cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Squeeze in the juice from the limes and divide the limes between each glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze in the juice from the limes and divide the limes between each glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Blend or shake until well combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Blend or shake until well combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Divide between the glasses and top with soda water and sprigs of mint.
recipeInstructions.text: Divide between the glasses and top with soda water and sprigs of mint.
